Name: Village businessman
About the game: In Village businessman, you play as a person who came to the village for a vacation, but an unpleasant situation happened... Everything was taken away from him, and now his task is to find ways to earn money, having only a house and a broken car, with which you will help the main character... Get different resources, collect the extracted resources and sell, buy new cars-with which transportation will be easier, businesses-that will bring you income. You can also just ride around the village, explore the area, and maybe even find something very valuable.
